TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PopupEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件类引发之前显示的工具提示。The event of the class is raised before a ToolTip is displayed. 此事件的处理程序接收类型的参数。The handler for this event receives a parameter of type . 此参数提供有关工具提示信息并使您可以修改通过工具提示的大小属性。This parameter provides information about the ToolTip and enables you to modify the size of the ToolTip through the property. 因为派生自，该处理程序也可以停止显示工具提示。Because derives from , the handler can also stop the ToolTip from being displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolTip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#619](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#619)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#619](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#619)]

MemberSignature.Value: public PopupEventArgs (System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window associatedWindow, System.Windows.Forms.Control associatedControl, bool isBalloon, System.Drawing.Size size);

public: PopupEventArgs(System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window ^ associatedWindow, System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ associatedControl, bool isBalloon, System::Drawing::Size size);

span.span: The that the ToolTip is bound to.

param.name: associatedControl
param.span: 将为其创建工具提示的 。

span.span: The that the ToolTip is being created for.

param.name: isBalloon
param.span: 若要指示关联的工具提示窗口具有气球状的样式外观，则为 ；否则为 ，指示工具提示窗口具有标准的矩形外观。

span.span: to indicate that the associated ToolTip window has a balloon-style appearance; otherwise, to indicate that the ToolTip window has a standard rectangular appearance.
Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数构造函数用于初始化相对应，同样命名属性。The parameters to the constructor are used to initialize the corresponding, similarly named properties. `associatedControl`参数可以为`null`如果所属的窗口的类型不是。The `associatedControl` parameter can be `null` if the owning window is not of type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssociatedControl As Control
public: property System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ AssociatedControl { System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取要为其绘制 的控件。

span.span: Gets the control for which the is being drawn.

value.span: 与 关联的 ，如果此工具提示不与控件关联，则为 。

span.span: The that is associated with the , or if the ToolTip is not associated with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为你可以将关联具有多个控件通过方法，你可以使用属性以确定哪些控件与关联事件。Because you can associate the with multiple controls through the method, you can use the property to determine which control the event is associated with. 这是你想要执行不同的工具提示自定义基于关联控件的情况下非常有用。This is helpful if you want to perform different ToolTip customization based on the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolTip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#619](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#619)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#619](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#619)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssociatedWindow As IWin32Window
public: property System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window ^ AssociatedWindow { System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此 要绑定到的窗口。

span.span: Gets the window to which this is bound.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当一个窗口拥有的另一个窗口时，拥有的窗口最小化，并关闭与所有者窗口。When a window is owned by another window, the owned window is minimized and closed with the owner window. 拥有的 windows 也不被显示在其所有者窗体后面。Owned windows are also never displayed behind their owner form. 在这种情况下，工具提示归本机 Win32 窗口中，由表示属性。In this case, the ToolTip is owned by the native Win32 window, represented by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolTip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsBalloon As Boolean
public: property bool IsBalloon { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示工具提示显示为标准矩形窗口还是气球状窗口。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the ToolTip is displayed as a standard rectangular or a balloon window.

value.span: 如果工具提示在气球状窗口中显示，则为 ，否则，如果使用标准矩形窗口，则为 。

span.span: if the ToolTip is displayed in a balloon window; otherwise, if a standard rectangular window is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用工具提示窗口中的类型中指定方法类。The type of window used for the ToolTip is specified in the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolTip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the ToolTip.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使事件处理程序来更改工具提示窗口的大小。The property enables the event handler to change the size of the ToolTip window. 结合的成员通常使用类自定义工具提示的外观。 is often used in conjunction with the members of the class to customize the appearance of ToolTips. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolTip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
